title: B.M. Birla Science Museum
description: Museum housing a science centre and dinosaurium, as well as a planetarium and an observatory.

title: T. Anjaiah Lumbini Park
description: Popular park on a lake with gardens, musical fountain shows, a large Buddha statue & boat rides.

title: Snow World
description: This family-friendly indoor park filled with artificial snow has slides, games & play areas.

title: Charminar
description: Iconic 16th-century mosque with 4 grand arches, 48m tall minarets and views over the Laad Bazaar.

title: Golconda Fort
description: Capital of a kingdom that flourished from the 14th to 16th century, with 87 semi-circular bastions.

title: Qutb Shahi Tombs
description: Ornate, domed tombs from 18th century, built for Qutub Shahi dynasty rulers with landscaped gardens.

title: Rajiv Gandhi International Airport
description: Airport named for the former Indian prime minister, opened in 2008 and set to further expand.

title: Nehru Zoological Park
description: Spacious 380-acre zoo featuring tigers, rhinos, elephants & monkeys, plus daily safari rides.

title: Sanjeevaiah Park
description: Bordered by a lake, this tree-filled 92-acre park features gardens & grassy areas for recreation.

title: Salar Jung Museum
description: Former art collection of the Salar Jung family from around the world, now a museum.
